title: Application For Registration As Citizen Of Botswana Of Adopted Child Over 3 Years

description.short: An application for the registration of an adopted child over 3 years old as a citizen of Botswana.
description.long: This is an application for the registration of an adopted child over 3 years old as a citizen of Botswana. The application is designed for individuals or families who have legally adopted a child and wish to formalize their citizenship status in Botswana

ministry: Ministry of Labour and Home Affairs
department: Department of Labour and Social Security

fields.fieldName: Being a citizen of Botswana and the sole adoptive parent, one of the adoptive parents, or the child to whom the particulars at hand relate, hereby apply on behalf of my adopted child for his/her registration as a citizen of Botswana.
fields.fieldLabel: Being a citizen of Botswana and the sole adoptive parent, one of the adoptive parents, or the child to whom the particulars at hand relate, hereby apply on behalf of my adopted child for his/her registration as a citizen of Botswana.
